snippet: Senator Jeff Sessions, Republican of Alabama and a determined opponent of immigration overhaul, said on Friday that the legislation is “dangerous” for American workers, and he vowed to work to slow the bill’s progress.
abstract: Senator Jeff Sessions, Republican of Alabama and a determined opponent of immigration overhaul, said on Friday that the legislation is “dangerous” for American workers, and he vowed to work to slow the bill’s progress.

headline.main: Sessions Says Immigration Bill Is a Threat to U.S. Workers
